keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Bangladesh on Saturday executed a senior Islamist party official convicted of crimes against humanity during the country’s 1971 independence war with Pakistan, two officials and two television stations said.

headline.print_headline: A Top Islamist Is Executed by Bangladesh
headline.main: A Top Islamist Is Executed by Bangladesh

snippet: Bangladesh on Saturday executed a senior Islamist party official convicted of crimes against humanity during the country’s 1971 independence war with Pakistan, two officials and two television stations said.
abstract: Bangladesh hangs Islamist party leader Mohammad Qamaruzzaman for war crimes committed during 1971 independence war with Pakistan.
